title: Bloomberg Markets: Moffett `Struggling' to Understand AT&T
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Moffett `Struggling' to Understand AT&T
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Craig Moffett\u0010Founder and Senior Research Analyst \u0010MoffettNathanson\u0010Discussing the headwinds AT&T's separate businesses are facing and what the purchase of Time Warner means for their media strategy.
